doc.title: EMBOSS

description.text: European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite

doc.reference: EMBOSS: The European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite (2000) Rice,P. Longden,I. and Bleasby, A. Trends in Genetics 16, (6) pp276--277

description.text: Finds regions of identity (exact matches) of two sequences

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.data-formats: EMBL FASTA GCG GENBANK NBRF CODATA RAW SWISSPROT GFF

Dump matches as alignments Yes No
Name of the output alignment file
Choose the alignment output format Fasta Msf Pair Markx0 Markx1 Markx2 Markx3 Markx10 Srs Srspair Score Unknown Multiple Simple Match

logfile option?
Statistics on distribution of kmers and matches

parameter.name: e_wordsize
parameter.prompt: Word size (value greater than or equal to 2)

format.code: ("", " -wordsize=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 2 is required
